name: Diesel Express VR
description: Diesel Express is a VR shooter game. As a Legionnaire of The Regiment, your duty is to make sure the trains, Dreadnoughts, arrive destinations safely. On the way, Dreadnought will be attacked by the bandits. You need to eliminate enemies which follow you by their Diesel Punk vehicles.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 Storage: 3 GB available space
